§ 51308. Uniforms, textbooks, and transportation allowances The Secretary of Transportation shall provide cadets at the United States Merchant Marine Academy—(1) all required uniforms and textbooks; and
(2) allowances for transportation (including reimbursement of traveling expenses) when traveling under orders as a cadet.
(Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(b), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1574.)
